mapper.select: select goods_id, goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, produce_time, produce_vendor, goods_count, warn_line, comment, purchase_time, purchase_staff from warehose_storage where goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.insert: insert into warehose_storage(goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, produce_time, produce_vendor, goods_count, warn_line, comment, purchase_time, purchase_staff) values (#{goodsName}, #{goodsType}, #{goodsPrice}, #{produceTime}, #{produceVendor}, #{goodsCount}, #{warnLine}, #{comment}, #{purchaseTime}, #{purchaseStaff})

insert into warehose_storage(goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, produce_time, produce_vendor, goods_count, warn_line, comment, purchase_time, purchase_staff) values
(#{entity.goodsName}, #{entity.goodsType}, #{entity.goodsPrice}, #{entity.produceTime}, #{entity.produceVendor}, #{entity.goodsCount}, #{entity.warnLine}, #{entity.comment}, #{entity.purchaseTime}, #{entity.purchaseStaff})

insert into warehose_storage(goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, produce_time, produce_vendor, goods_count, warn_line, comment, purchase_time, purchase_staff) values
(#{entity.goodsName}, #{entity.goodsType}, #{entity.goodsPrice}, #{entity.produceTime}, #{entity.produceVendor}, #{entity.goodsCount}, #{entity.warnLine}, #{entity.comment}, #{entity.purchaseTime}, #{entity.purchaseStaff})
on duplicate key update goods_name = values(goods_name), goods_type = values(goods_type), goods_price = values(goods_price), produce_time = values(produce_time), produce_vendor = values(produce_vendor), goods_count = values(goods_count), warn_line = values(warn_line), comment = values(comment), purchase_time = values(purchase_time), purchase_staff = values(purchase_staff)
mapper.update:
update warehose_storage
goods_name = #{goodsName},
goods_type = #{goodsType},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice},
produce_time = #{produceTime},
produce_vendor = #{produceVendor},
goods_count = #{goodsCount},
warn_line = #{warnLine},
comment = #{comment},
purchase_time = #{purchaseTime},
purchase_staff = #{purchaseStaff},
where goods_id = #{goodsId}
